page.title: 17LIFE FOR A CHILD IN SHAW 1
page.content:
My name is Carol Potts.I am 9 years old and I live in a house with my brother,mum,dad and pet snake.This is what happens on a typical weekday.
At 7.00am I wake up and my mum comes in.She says good morning and asks me what I want for breakfast.I usually say buttered toast.Then I go into the bathroom and have a wash.When I come out I get dressed and go downstairs. After breakfast I pack my schoolbag, clean my teeth and brush my hair.Then I watch television for 10 minutes.As soon as I have seen my mum,brother and dad off to work or school,I go up the road to my friend Kay's house and walk to school with her.
